history.proof: hauto use: lb_pointwise_sym unfold: orb, lb_join inv: bool.

ctx: induction l as [| a l IHl].
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "?M1446 ↑ nil" in the current goal.

ctx: induction l as [| a l IHl].
exceptions.exn: In environment m : lb Unable to unify "m" with "nil ↑ m".

ctx: induction l as [| a l IHl].
exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: induction l as [| a l IHl].

ctx: induction l as [| a l IHl].
induction m as [| b m IHm].
exceptions.exn: In environment a : bool l : lb IHl : l ↑ nil = nil ↑ l Unable to unify "nil ↑ (a :: l)" with "a :: l".

ctx: induction l as [| a l IHl].

ctx: induction l as [| a l IHl].

ctx: induction l as [| a l IHl].
induction m as [| b m IHm].
exceptions.exn: In environment a : bool l : lb b : bool m : lb IHl : l ↑ (b :: m) = (b :: m) ↑ l IHm : l ↑ m = m ↑ l -> (a :: l) ↑ m = m ↑ (a :: l) Unable to unify "?M1462 ↓ ?M1463 = ?M1463 ↓ ?M1462" with "b || a :: m ↑ l = a || b :: l ↑ m".

original: induction l as [| a l IHl]. - rewrite lb_join_left. rewrite lb_join_left. reflexivity. - induction m as [| b m IHm]. + rewrite lb_join_left. rewrite lb_join_left. reflexivity. + simpl. rewrite IHl, IHm. symmetry. apply lb_meet_comm.
